availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edmund J. Shackelford (Richmond, Madison County, Kentucky, clerk and soldier)

body.p: Richmond, Madison County, Kentucky, clerk and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Nannie Embry Shackelford on October 10, 1867. Clerk in Madison County in 1864. Enrolled in (U.S.A.) on February 1, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
_ U.S., Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934_ The National Archives at Washington, D.C., Record Group Number: 15, (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Madison County, KY, February 1864, p. 317, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film 000183302.
Find A Grave, "Edmund Shackelford (1840-1917)," Memorial #123841431 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/123841431 (accessed January X, 2019).
